A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With plenty of twists and turns\, a cohesive story and a sheer tour-de-force of drama and action\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi blurs the lines between good and evil and instills a sense of hope for its moviegoers and hardcore fanbase. The newest entry provides more than just spark and makes for a unique yet improving installment. 4.7/5
